translated: Domenico Ghirlandiao (real name Domenico di Tommaso di Curradi Doffo Bigordi) was an Italian painter of the fifteenth century, born in 1449 in Florence and died in 1494 in Florence.
original: Domenico Ghirlandiao (de son vrai nom Domenico di Tommaso Curradi di Doffo Bigordi) est un peintre italien du XVe siècle, né en 1449 à Florence et mort en 1494 à Florence.
